hints.content:
Joe completed $\tealE{23}$ problems by himself and $\goldE{13}$ problems with Sal.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9f6438f2e483e49d57db257c31191a77ab133b44)

$\tealE{23} + \goldE{13} = \maroonD{36}$

Joe completed $\maroonD{36}$ problems.

Joe has $\blueE9$ problems left to solve.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c89e214f8ea62f302949ddc44953ea501df8b346)

$\maroonD{36} + \blueE9 = \purpleD{45}$

There were $\purpleD{45}$ total problems.
Joe had $\purpleD{45}$ math problems when he started.

question.content:
Joe started his math homework.  He finished $23$ problems by himself.  He finished $13$ more problems with help from Sal.  There are $9$ math problems left.    

**How many math problems did Joe have when he started?  **
